sub_title: Product and project leader | B2B & B2C
summary:
Three years leading product development focusing on maximum value with minimum wastage. Two years of high-pressure project management with people leadership. Able to handle challenges by problem-solving creatively. Strategic thinker and data driven. 

Product management, project management, people leadership, strategy, business analysis and data analytics. 

My defining traits are my ability to learn and loving a challenge.

profile_positions.description: Leading a multi-year project to build and scale a MACH ecommerce B2B platform, to operate across our European markets. Running a cross-functional team and working across borders and cultures. Focusing on implementing value in incremental stages to expand both the depth of functionality and market penetration over time.
profile_positions.title: Group Product Manager

profile_positions.description: Owner of BESTSELLER's Ecommerce Data Strategy. The planning, implementation and direction of resource allocation towards adding the greatest value to the business. Integration with front-end systems and the distribution of clean and functional data to consumers. As part of this, lead for Finance transformation, as well as project management of various business initiatives.
profile_positions.title: Product Manager - Data

profile_positions.description: Product Owner and process improvement for Finance Tech. Managing the product backlog and engaging with stakeholders to deliver the greatest value to Finance operations. I also provide value as a project manager and process improvement specialist, leading the drive to automation, improved technology adoption. Specific projects involved leading the development of a new giftcard redemption solution, migration of Finance ETL processes to refine the posting and accuracy of revenue posting.
profile_positions.title: Product Owner - Finance Systems

profile_positions.description: Working in ACC's transformation program owning change delivery. As part of a 50m Euro project to replace the core system used for the invoicing and management of over half a million B2B customers. Lead a cross-functional team responsible for managing the operational impacts of the software transition. We undertook testing, data cleansing, process mapping and training responsibilities. I worked with the business to clearly understand requirements and the critical sequence of events and then lead the development of plans and support to manage the transitions of all impacted teams. This was a demonstrable success with the new system going live with minimal disruption to business operations. A part of this role also involved me project managing ACC's 2017 annual billing cycle.
profile_positions.title: Project Manager

profile_positions.description: Product Owner for ACC's development of brand new online portal for B2B customers. I led a team of developers and testers within an Agile Scrum framework to develop and release MyACC for Business service. Leading the development and launch of the prototype for self-employed customers as a proof of concept before working with the team on the larger MyACC service. Championing the business and the customer, leading the design of services to address key customer pain points based on research and user testing. Managing the backlog of user stories, and prioritizing them to maximize value delivery.
profile_positions.title: Product Owner - Digital

profile_positions.description: Was responsible for delivering organisation-wide performance monitoring and strategic planning. Worked closely with a variety of business intelligence and data analytics tools. Produced ACC's monthly performance report to the Executive, as well as accountability documents. Also worked with organisational leaders on strategy development. Produced the 2014 Annual Report which won Silver at the Australasian Reporting Awards - and was ACC's first award winning Annual Report.
profile_positions.title: Senior Business Analyst

company.name: Ministry of Business, Innovation and Employment

profile_positions.company: Ministry of Business, Innovation and Employment
profile_positions.description: I served as the ACC representative on a cross-government panel run by the Ministry of Business, Innovation and Employment to improve government services to business. This was a part-time commitment in addition to my other roles over this period. This involved collaborating with other government agencies to facilitate insights and delivery towards businesses in New Zealand and the growing GovTech sector. I also worked closely with startups and contributed significantly with the launch and growth of 2Shakes, an online on-boarding platform. They have grown to be the most successful GovTech startup in New Zealand.
profile_positions.title: Agency Engagement Representative

volunteer_experiences.description: I volunteered for 3 weeks with the the Loggerhead Turtle conservation project based on the island of Kefalonia Greece. We cleaned beaches, did beach patrols at night and monitored turtle activity in the area. It included one of the highlights of my life which was an encounter with a 100kg fully grown female loggerhead turtle, and the tagging and measurement of it. Such a beautiful creature!

For two years running, I participated in the Cancer Society's Relay for Life event to raise money for Cancer. To maximise donations and as a personal challenge, I endeavored to walk the length of the track for the full 18 hours of the event, covering about 60km in that time. I did this as part of the ACC team, and in total I fundraised almost $2000 for the Cancer Society.
